919 AOC's Attempts at Using Math to Convince Senate Dems to Keep the Government Closed Too Funny NOT to Share (twitchy.com) posted 2 days ago by Eruditio 46 comments award share report block AOC's Attempts at Using Math to Convince Senate Dems to Keep the Government Closed Too Funny NOT to Share AOC's math fails in her plea to Senate Dems during government shutdown talks, hilariously shared. twitchy.com

AOC speaks fluently, high verbal IQ (~110-115). But quantitative reasoning near bottom-tier—repeated arithmetic/category errors on budgets, incentives, stats. Can't distinguish stocks/flows, incentives/cash. Policy arguments collapse under basic scrutiny. Emotional framing > data.
Estimated IQ Range: 95-105 overall (verbal strong, math/reasoning ~80-85). Lowest quantitative literacy in Congress.
Verdict: AOC is the weakest on basic math/economic logic. Hank Johnson is dumber on physics/spatial, but AOC fails harder on numbers that matter for her job. permalink award report block reply Tardigrade 5 points 2 days ago I'm willing to cut Hank a bit of slack if the rumors are true that he had hepatic encephalopathy at the time. permalink parent award report block reply Valiazaner 9 points 2 days ago I felt so bad for that Admiral having to sit through that and calmy explain to a Congressmen how an island works. permalink parent award report block reply SteveRogers42 2 points 2 days ago And not break out laughing. permalink parent award report block reply JoePlumber 3 points 2 days ago Idk if Grok factored that in. It's like being drunk but it doesn't just wear off and by the time you get it, you're so sick, that's probably the least of your problems. It's not funny, but if you live with someone that has it on a regular basis, it can be kind of funny. They act drunk  because it's a similar mechanism. Often comes with brain fog too, so not only are you malfunctioning, even the usual logic functions are impaired. Both drunk and retarded. It's like a potato on a bottle of vodka. Edit: getting sick of your shit, auto correct. permalink parent award report block reply ReturnOfSmarm 3 points 2 days ago https://youtu.be/_xjgI5oN8DM permalink award report block reply whybag 2 points 2 days ago Remember when Tucker displayed this AOC photo on his program, and people accused him of posting a photoshop because her eyes are so retarded? permalink award report block reply Smurfection 2 points 2 days ago At this point, I want to bring back county farms,  Before Dems like Roosevelt and Johnson got it into their heads that the Federal Government had to provide each and every citizen, counties used to do that.  They system kind of collapsed in the early 20th century though because of all the immigrants from Europe who transformed all the big cities into Democrat bastions of perfidy, corruption, mobsters and drunks. Aside from asylums, where actual mentally ill people went, not crazy criminals that brought on their psychosis by narcotics, people who were indigent could go work on a county farm.  Men and women lived separately and there were some housing for families that fell on hard times. The people there would work the farm, process the raw agricultural product and then receive some money that was put into an account for them.   They worked the farm until they had enough to go get housing or found gainful employment.  One catch though, the person had to live in the communal housing, no alcohol, meals in common, Private property that wasn't needed had to be stored or sold off.  Often county farms were run by local churches so the workers had to attend church services on Sundays and sometimes, complete a Bible study.   Also, the workers right to freely come and go was restricted.  They had to stay on the farm and there were curfews.  Most of them didn't allow gambling either.  To leave the farm, they had to show they had housing or gainful employment or a relative with housing was taking the person in. permalink award report block reply SicSemperTyrannis2 -3 points 2 days ago TIL MCFGA Make County Farms Great Again Also, updoot for using "perfidy," we should use that at the nearest antifa meeting to watch their heads explode permalink parent award report block reply 5DchessWatch 2 points 2 days ago She's correct about the ACA number--the avg aca subsidy was that, in 2025 its over 600.  Dont know about snap . But it doesn't matter Because ACA is horrific corporatism, not socialism-- and the subsidy is only for the poor.  The middle class again, is the one screwed the hardest. People's premiums have gone asymptotic It's worse than having nothing at all.  Obama has nearly destroyed this country with it; and its been a gift to the healthcare systems and healthcare insurance industry at the cost of end user wealth accumulation. We should always be trying to increase wealth of the middle class working person.  Period. That's the foundational principle of america.  Leave people alone so they can work and be fruitful.  Only intervening to preserve other people's / everyone's rights. permalink award report block reply Nibba2 1 points 2 days ago What’s the math? Is she saying that is a lot of dollars to each person?
